titleinfo.title: Indians for Indians Radio Show, October 19, 1948

mods.tableOfContents: Joe Canard in Creek. Stomp Dances by Joe Hicks (With Turtle Shells). Four Corners Dance. Stomp Dance. Gar Fish Dance. Stomp Dance (Answers Self). Ribbon Dance. Ball Game Songs.
mods.note: When citing recordings from this collection, please using the following: Indians for Indians Radio Show. Western History Collections, University of Oklahoma Libraries.
